projectsData.name: WanderPedia - Your Travel Buddy
projectsData.details: Implementation of a highly advanced travel companion application that utilizes Google Maps, Geolocation, Google Maps API, specialized Rapid APIs

projectsData.name: Securify
projectsData.details: Face recognition smart door surveillance assistant using OpenCV and text to speech conversion library

projectsData.name: Fiesta management system
projectsData.details: A full fledged Management System designed for Fiesta Cafeteria, which would prove to be useful for every employee working at Advant. It contains various advanced functionalities like Add/Update/Propose Menu for a day, Place Order, View/Update Balance
